Name: Sven
Bio: Sven is the bastard son of a Vigil Knight, born of a Pallid Meranth, raised in the Shadeshore Ruins. With his father executed for violating the Vigil Codex, and his mother shunned by her wild race, Sven believes that honor is to be found in no social order, but only in himself. After tending his mother through a lingering death, he offered himself as a novice to the Vigil Knights, never revealing his identity. For thirteen years he studied in his father's school, mastering the rigid code that declared his existence an abomination. Then, on the day that should have been his In-Swearing, he seized the Outcast Blade, shattered the Sacred Helm, and burned the Codex in the Vigil's Holy Flame. He strode from Vigil Keep, forever solitary, following his private code to the last strict rune. Still a knight, yes...but a Rogue Knight. He answers only to himself.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
Abilities.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.

Abilities.desc: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
Abilities.notes:
Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.
Abilities.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

Abilities.desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 8 seconds.
Abilities.notes: Fully stacks with other armor and speed granting abilities.
Abilities.attribute:
BONUS ARMOR: 5 / 10 / 15 / 20
BONUS SPEED: 12%
RADIUS: 900
DURATION: 8
Abilities.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!

Abilities.desc:
Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
Abilities.notes: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.
Abilities.attribute:
BONUS DAMAGE: 80% / 120% / 160%
BONUS STRENGTH: 12 / 24 / 36
SCEPTER ALLY AURA RADIUS:900
SCEPTER ALLY BONUS DAMAGE: 75% / 100% / 125%
Abilities.lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.

Talents.desc: 500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning
